To the poor and the rich is to be given the message of healing through Christ. My brethren, work earnestly and seriously. This does not mean that 


                                   -138- 

you are not to be cheerful, but that you are to put your whole heart into the work of preparing the way for Christ's coming. He calls for wholehearted, unselfish men to sound the note of warning.--Ms 10, 1905, p. 5. ("Non-essential Subjects to be Avoided," September 12, 1904.)
